subject: Any eBay sellers willing to do this?
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
I was thinking if someone would list a FREE DOWNLOAD of instructions for the various hacks 
on the Radio Shack units, it could put an end to the business for sellers that are taking 
advantage of people who are unaware that they could probably hack the units for 
themselves.  

I have seen "downloads" of various things listed before.  Why not this?

Margaret
